property.name: strTitle
property.label: Filter Title
property.description: Title for the lookup filter section

property.name: strLookupApiName
property.label: Lookup API Name
property.description: API Name of the of the field

property.name: strObjectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API Name of the object which is beeing looked up by the field

property.name: strFieldFilters
property.label: Filter Expression
property.description: Filter expression for lookup. Left hand expression must be for target object while right hand expression must be of current object on which lookup field is defined or a value

property.name: strSearchFields
property.label: Search Fields
property.description: ',' separated field API names in target object which will be searched.

property.name: strDisplayFields
property.label: Display Fields
property.description: ',' separated field API names in target object which will be displayed.

property.name: strOrderByClause
property.label: Order By Clause
property.description: ',' separated field API names in target object which will be displayed.
